Fault.name: Mediators/Mediatordemo.mplan
Fault.msg: Assigning property/constant "xp20:ends-with('new',$in.request/inp1:singleString)" to element "$out.reply/inp1:singleString". Please make sure target is single leaf node, otherwise non-leaf node will contain only string value which may generate non-valid xml as per the xsd.
